ae.msg: Sorry, the argument `{{args}}` is invalid or has not been defined

pe.msg: Oops! You don't have the permission `{{perm}}`, needed to run this command

mc.msg: The user `{{user.username}}` has been muted by `{{staff.username}}`

umc.msg: The user `{{user.username}}` has been unmuted by `{{staff.username}}`

bc.msg: The user `{{user.username}}` has been banned by `{{staff.username}}`, for the reason `{{motivo}}`

ne.msg: The argument `{{arg}}` is not a number

sm.msg: You don't have enough balance for that! You need more `{{precisa}}` {{money.toUpperCase()}}

n.msg: You lost all your {{nome}} wagered back !

c.msg: You won all your {{nome}} wagered back !

g.msg: You won your {{nome}} wagered multiplied by `{{x}}` !
